title: Three Monkey optimism
author: VD
content_html:
Hope springs eternal in the Three Monkey Republican breast:

Obama and Clinton together raised $59 million. Giuliani and Romney raised $31 million.

This leads Stanley Kurtz of NRO to ask: “Could contributors holding their money for Thompson at least partly explain the low GOP figures?”

Sure, but this is just another indication of what I have been writing since well before the 2006 elections, that Hillary is going to win in a landslide. The Bush administration’s repudiation of conservatives, the borders and national sovereignty is the reason Republican fundraising is down.

As it should be. You’d have to be insane to support any Republican not named Ron Paul at this point. He probably can’t win, but supporting anyone else is guaranteeing a sixth Bush-Clinton presidential administration.
content_text:
Hope springs eternal in the Three Monkey Republican breast:
Obama and Clinton together raised $59 million.  Giuliani and Romney raised $31 million.
This leads Stanley Kurtz of NRO to ask: “Could contributors holding their money for Thompson at least partly explain the low GOP figures?”
Sure, but this is just another indication of what I have been writing since well before the 2006 elections, that Hillary is going to win in a landslide.  The Bush administration’s repudiation of conservatives, the borders and national sovereignty is the reason Republican fundraising is down.
As it should be.  You’d have to be insane to support any Republican not named Ron Paul at this point.  He probably can’t win, but supporting anyone else is guaranteeing a sixth Bush-Clinton presidential administration.
